Primitive.name: playerStats
Primitive.description: Each row is an individual player. C1 = rating, C2 = rating deviation, C3 = votality, C4 = rated

Primitive.name: roundResults
Primitive.description: Use 2 = win, 1 = draw, 0 = loose, -1 = no participation, -2 = ignored

Primitive.name: ratingPeriod
Primitive.description: Determines the length of a single rating period in rounds.

Primitive.name: tau
Primitive.description: Constant used to constrain volatility change over time. Lower value = Less change. Higher value = More change.

Primitive.name: displayCodeOnly
Primitive.description: Display only data column and code.

Primitive.name: ratingBarColor
Primitive.description: Color of bars used in the rating visualization.
